categories.desc1: The best tools for your workshop...

about.desc: Slot Narzędziowy is a store that combines modernity with practicality. Our mission is to deliver the highest quality tools and accessories that meet the expectations of even the most demanding customers.
about.desc1: At Slot Narzędziowy, we prioritize quality, trust, and customer satisfaction. Every product in our offer has been carefully selected to meet the diverse needs of both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.
about.desc2: We offer a wide range of hand tools, power tools, and workshop accessories. With our selection, you can equip your workshop with the best products on the market.
about.desc3: By choosing Slot Narzędziowy, you choose professionalism, high quality, and comprehensive service. We are proud to help you realize your projects with the best tools.

testimonials.desc1: Great quality tools! Thanks to Slot Narzędziowy, my projects are completed faster and more efficiently.
testimonials.desc2: Top-notch customer service. I recommend it to anyone looking for professional tools.
testimonials.desc3: I found everything I needed for my workshop here. I'll definitely be back for more purchases!

newsletter.text: Get a 20% discount on all products with your first order.

products.desc1: Modern wireless drill, ideal for precise work in any workshop.
products.desc2: Durable and solid electronic hammer, perfect for demanding construction projects.
products.desc3: High-quality circular saw, ensuring precise and quick cuts.
products.desc4: Professional grinder that guarantees smooth and precise surface finishes.
products.desc5: High-quality screwdriver ideal for home and professional tasks.
products.desc6: Professional table saw, ensuring precise cutting of any material.
products.desc7: Powerful hammer drill for construction and renovation work.
products.desc8: Reciprocating saw ideal for cutting wood and metal.
products.desc9: Durable corded drill for intensive use.

cookie.text2: Slot Narzędziowy uses cookies to enhance your experience on our website and deliver more personalized services.
cookie.text3: Cookies are small files stored on your device by our website. They help improve site functionality and optimize user experience.
cookie.text4: You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of some features on our site.
cookie.text5: By using our site, you agree to the use of cookies as described in this policy. If you have any questions about cookies, contact us at support@slotnarzedziowy.com.
cookie.item1: To monitor our website's performance and enhance your user experience.
cookie.item2: To remember your preferences, allowing us to deliver better services.
cookie.item3: Essential cookies: Required for basic site functionality, like remembering your shopping cart or login details.
cookie.item4: Analytical cookies: Used to monitor site usage and improve performance.

warunki.text2: Welcome to swiatecznyslot.com. By using our website, you accept the terms of use outlined below.
warunki.text3: All content on this website, including images and logos, is owned by swiatecznyslot.com. Unauthorized use of content is prohibited.
warunki.text4: We are not responsible for any damages arising from the use of our website or services provided.
warunki.text5: We reserve the right to amend these terms at any time. Continuing to use the website after changes means acceptance of the new terms.
warunki.text6: If you have any questions, contact us at support@slotnarzedziowy.com.
warunki.item1: To use our services and make purchases, you must be at least 18 years old.
warunki.item2: You agree to use our website in accordance with applicable laws.

privacy.title2: 2. How do we use your data?
privacy.text2: Slot Narzędziowy (we, our, us) respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data while using our website.
privacy.text3: We do not share your personal data with third parties unless required by law.
privacy.text4: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website and deliver more personalized services.
privacy.text5: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal data.
privacy.text6: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data.
privacy.text7: If you have any privacy-related questions, contact us at support@slotnarzedziowy.com.
privacy.item1: Personal data you provide (name, email address, etc.).
